title: Sniper.Elite.V2.Complete - PLAZA
description:
Sniper Elite V2 *Complete* (c) Rebellion

Release Date: 06/2017 Protection: Steam+CEG+Custom
Discs: 1 Genre: Action

In the dark days of the end of World War Two amidst the ruins of
Berlin, one bullet can change history. Sniper Elite V2 is an award
winning and authentic World War II sniping experience. You are elite
US sniper Karl Fairburne. Parachuted into Berlin amidst the Germans
final stand, your mission is to prevent Nazi V2 rocket program
technology from falling into the hands of the besieging Red Army

For more info go to: http://store.steampowered.com/app/63380/

1. Extract release
2. Mount ISO
3. Install the game
4. Copy crack from the PLAZA folder
5. Play!

Notes: As the DLC and further updates were never released for this
game, we decided to tag the release as "Complete" that includes the
following downloadable content:

> Sniper Elite V2 - Hitler Mission
> Sniper Elite V2 - Rifle Pack
> Sniper Elite V2 - The Neudorf Outpost Pack
> Sniper Elite V2 - The Landwehr Canal Pack
> Sniper Elite V2 - Saint Pierre

Also the game is updated to the latest version (1.13)

Included languages:

> English
> German
> French
> Italian
> Spanish
> Polish
> Russian
